verses.name: Ephesians 3:14
verses.text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.name: Ephesians 3:15
verses.text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,

verses.name: Ephesians 3:16
verses.text: That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;

verses.name: Ephesians 3:17
verses.text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,

verses.name: Ephesians 3:18
verses.text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;
